Package client.mvc.view.game

Interface BoardPanel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoardPanelImpl
public interface BoardPanel
Defines a set of method useful to handle the game board.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addTiles(List<BoardTile> boardTiles)
    add the given tiles to the board
    void
    disableClicks()
    disable operations
    void
    enableClicks()
    enable operations
    void
    fixNewPlacedTiles()
    make new placed tiles unmodifiable. call this method at the end of the turn to fix new placed tiles to the board.

  • Method Details

    • getNewPlacedTiles

      List<BoardTile> getNewPlacedTiles()
      Returns:
      the list of tiles placed by the user in the current turn

    • fixNewPlacedTiles

      void fixNewPlacedTiles()
      make new placed tiles unmodifiable. call this method at the end of the turn to fix new placed tiles to the board.

    • reset

      void reset()
      undo the tiles placing operation.

    • addTiles

      void addTiles(List<BoardTile> boardTiles)
      add the given tiles to the board
      Parameters:
      boardTiles - tiles to add to the board
